mean_cn: v. 从中作梗，阻挠，妨碍；  n. 妨碍球
mean_en: to stop (someone) from doing something or to stop (something) from happening
short_phrase: be stymied while trying to break in to sb.'s computer
sentence: He tried to access the stolen laptop, but was stymied by the password protection.
sentence_trans: 他试图使用盗来的电脑，却被密码保护阻挠。
